Class SignMessageImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.SignMessageImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, Storable, SignMessage
public class SignMessageImpl extends BaseObjectImpl implements SignMessage
A sign message represents a message which can be displayed on a dynamic message sign (DMS). All values in these messages are *immutable* -- if any changes are needed, a new sign message must be created.
Author:
Douglas Lau

  • Method Details

    • findOrCreate

      public static SignMessage findOrCreate(SignConfig sc, String inc, String ms, String owner, boolean fb, boolean ps, SignMsgPriority mp, Integer dur)
      Find or create a sign message.
      Parameters:
      sc - Sign configuration.
      inc - Associated incident (original name).
      ms - MULTI string for message.
      owner - Message owner.
      fb - Flash beacon flag.
      ps - Pixel service flag.
      mp - Message priority.
      dur - Duration in minutes; null means indefinite.
      Returns:
      New sign message, or null on error.

    • getMsgOwner

      public String getMsgOwner()
      Get the message owner. It contains 3 parts, separated by semicolons, for example "IRIS; operator+schedule; john.smith" 1. System ("IRIS") 2. Sources ("operator+schedule") 3. Name: user or action plan ("john.smith")
      Specified by:
      getMsgOwner in interface SignMessage
      Returns:
      Message owner
      See Also:
      • SignMsgSource
